statements: DELETE FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE location = 'Great Barrier Reef';
DELETE FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE size > 100 AND location LIKE '%Pacific%' AND regulations IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE area_id = 123 AND area_name = 'Coral Reef';
DELETE FROM marine_species WHERE common_name = 'Dolphin' AND habitat = 'Ocean';
DELETE FROM marine_activities WHERE area_id IN (SELECT area_id FROM marine_protected_areas WHERE location = 'Pacific Ocean');
DELETE FROM MarineEvents WHERE event_name = 'Dolphin Show' AND event_date > '2022-01-01';
